sentences.sContent: Every step will be taken to preserve your anonymity.
sentences.sCn: 将采取各种措施确保你的姓名保密。

sentences.sContent: One official, who spoke on condition of anonymity (=  he would only speak if his name was not told  ) , said the White House took the threat very seriously.
sentences.sCn: 一位不愿公开姓名的官员称，白宫非常重视这一威胁。

sentences.sContent: the anonymity of city streets (=  you do not know anyone, and no one knows you  )
sentences.sCn: 城市街头人人互不相识

remMethod.val: an(没有) + onym(名称) + ity → 无名， 匿名

words.tran: 匿名的，无名的；无个性特征的

trans.tranOther: when other people do not know who you are or what your name is
